value.title: Do you want DYNAMIC legends in Power BI??? Of course you do...
value.excerpt: We wish Power BI had dynamic legends based on selections! Well, Patrick took the challenge and here is a way you can do just that! Shout out to Parker Stevens, at BI Elite, for getting us started on this.  BI Elite video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8e8a3o1w51M BI Elite Twitter: https://twitter.com/PowerBIElite

value.title: Dynamic Power BI reports using Parameters
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick shows you how you can use a parameter, within a Power BI report, to dynamically change the data in a report. This uses M Functions within Power Query and a second source that has the key values to pull. Then using a gateway to enable refresh.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Administer Power BI, Part 1 - Tenants, governance, collaboration
value.excerpt: As an administrator, how do you manage a Power BI tenant? How do you configure tenant settings, monitor usage, and provision licenses and other organizational resources? This learning path covers typical tasks and tools, such as the Power BI admin portal and Office 365 admin center. You will learn how to establish and provide governance for a Power BI environment and provision Power BI Premium capacity.

topItems.title: Understand the Power BI administrator role
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to administer Power BI to support business decisions backed by data.

topItems.title: Establish a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: This module covers topics relating to establishing a Power BI environment within Office 365 containers.

topItems.title: Provide governance in a Power BI environment
topItems.excerpt: Learn the fundamental rules, regulations, and policies of a BI governance approach.

topItems.title: Facilitate collaboration and sharing in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Learn how to collaborate and share dashboards and reports with coworkers.

value.title: Distribute Power BI insights
value.excerpt: Distribute Power BI insights

topItems.title: Publish and share in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Publish and share your Power BI reports and dashboards to teammates in your organization or to everyone on the web.

topItems.title: Explore data in Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Turn your business intelligence data into data insights by creating and configuring Power BI dashboards.
